The Full Armor of God

\w Tychicus|strong="G5190"\w*, \w the|strong="G1722"\w* beloved brother \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w faithful|strong="G4103"\w* \w servant|strong="G1249"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w will|strong="G5101"\w* \w tell|strong="G1492"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w everything|strong="G3956"\w*, \w so|strong="G2443"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w may|strong="G2532"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w about|strong="G2596"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1473"\w* \w doing|strong="G4238"\w*.
